```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
realis <- read_csv("data/realis2019.csv")
```

## Loading R Packages

In the code chunk below, [p_load()](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/pacman/versions/0.5.1/topics/p_load) of [pacman](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/pacman/index.html) package is used to load tidyverse family of packages.

```{r}
realis.csv <- read.csv("data/realis2019.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = realis, 
       aes(x= `Unit Price ($ psm)`)) + geom_histogram()
```
